summary: This is just a reskin of the vampirelord  female and male and some armor  texture ,chainmail chest part and shorter kilts
descriptionHtml:
This is just a reskin of the vampirelord  female and male and made personaly for myself and like to share it .

I whas not satisfyed with what i could find for Vampire Lords, so i thought i create one for my own taste.

 I tryed to give them both a completely body texture, accept for the genetalias, 
for me no personal reason to put it on a beast race.Vanilla body got gaps in the skin were the body armor is placed, also between the legs and bottax and front is the body texture made for wearing a armor.

 I created muscle to the buttox,leg part front and back, new nail texture and closed the most seams on the body\'s, maby here and there are some seams visible.

Body is several shades lighter, muscles better visible and made better braided hair

 the skins are usuable with skimpy armor mods  for the vampirelords.

For the armor i removed the cape and made the kilt shorter so that the buttoxs and leg muscles  are visible for the most part but still not to skimpy 

The female got a chainmail chest piece ,what i think fit much better to the armor. For those there is also a nude chest option

Retexured the armor, made the metals grey , put red gems on it, other leather, most metals complete changed the textures, maby in future i change the back and head piece to.

Complete new wing textures were you can choose from whole wings or broken wings.
Sorry that i could not make the wings bigger, i can not fiddle with the meshes and that is all  the space i had to make a wing texture, if someone can make the wingflaps bigger be my guest.

Sorry for the bad inworld picture, it seems that i can\'t get in TFC as vampirelord, this way i can\'t make close up screens so the details are  visible on the best way

Enjoy my version of the Vampire Lord Male and Female

Requirements: 
Dawnguard DLC


 Install:
Place the texture folder in your Data folder of Skyrim
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

toggle nmm archivevalidation

Uninstall:
Remove the folder vampirelord from your data folder of skyrim
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\




Update Log:
Retexured the armor, made the metals grey , put red gems on it, different leather material, most metals complete changed the textures, eccept the metal plates on the chest and the head crown, maby in future i change the back and head piece to.

Complete new wing textures and made the whole
author: Xazomn
